section.h1: Welcome to Great Hearts Lincoln Prep, Serving Grades 6-12

div.p: Lincoln Preparatory Academy is a state-chartered public school providing an honors level liberal arts curriculum in the tradition of the finest independent private schools. As such, we offer an outstanding opportunity for families who want the very best in a college preparatory institution.

Lincoln Prep is a member of the prestigious Great Hearts Academies network of prep schools in the metropolitan Phoenix area. Together, the Great Hearts Academies are setting a new standard and purpose for public secondary education. Our schools believe in each student’s innate potential to comprehend the rich tradition of Western Civilization to which he/she is heir and to grow in the virtues that mark a profound, philosophical life summarized by the triad of our Latin motto: verum, pulchrum, bonum – truth, beauty and goodness.
We invite interested parents and prospective students to learn more about this opportunity by clicking the links above.

TOUR LINCOLN PREP: While touring Lincoln Prep is the best way to see the transformative educational experience we offer, we are unfortunately unable to offer any tours until we are back on campus with normal operating hours. Thank you for your understanding and patience as we work through this together.

div.p: Re-enrollment is open and completely online! Please click the link to complete your students re-enrollment for 20-21. The process is short and sweet but does require action on your part to guarantee your students seat for next year.
Summer School registration is open from April 6 through June 1. Please click the link to register now!

Charter schools receive $1,500 less per student annually in public funding compared to district schools which means less money for teachers and programs. With your help, we can educate more great-hearted leaders who are prepared for the 21st Century.
The Lincoln Prep office is open Monday through Friday 7:30am-3:45pm, except on Wednesday as the office closes at 1:30pm. Please review the Academic Calendar for closures on specific dates.

From May 25 through July 2, the Prep office will be open from 8am-1pm, Monday through Thursday, closed on Fridays. From July 3-July 19, the office will be closed for summer break. We will reopen with regular hours on July 20.
